title: Classic Galio Skin
body:
I had a personal connection with the Gargoyle. I loved his quirky blue and yellow color scheme and glowing red eyes. Is it possible that there are others out there like me? Maybe some kind soul from Riot that misses the classic Galio as well?

Plzplzplzplzplzplz!

replies.body: I think Riot should make a traditional {{champion:3}} skin.

A Gargoyle Galio skin would be cool, maybe for the Harrowing with a Victorian gothic style?

https://img0.etsystatic.com/033/1/6611438/il_340x270.569992952_n1ol.jpg
Riot stopped doing traditional skins a while ago, I'm afraid. The closest we're going to get is Enchanted Galio.

> [{quoted}](name=Dragonzzilla,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=FcBcVrpi,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-08-25T20:31:49.248+0000)
>
> Riot stopped doing traditional skins a while ago, I'm afraid. The closest we're going to get is Enchanted Galio.

Why would they do that?

Because they "improved on their champion update process", ensuring that "reworked champion remains faitful to the original, eliminating the need for a traditional skin."

Considering that new Galio is the biggest butchering of a champion since Karma they should make an exception.
